meaningMnemonic: The <radical>turtle</radical> radical and the <kanji>turtle</kanji> kanji are exactly the same! Nice!
readingMnemonic: You know Dragon Ball Z, right? Imagine this <kanji>turtle</kanji> doing a <reading>Kame</reading>hameha (かめ). The turtle charges up his energy and releases a mighty Kamehameha blast. Shwooom!
